meta.job_title: Test Environments Manufacturing Engineer/Fabrication Shop Lead

duties_responsibilities.duty: Review incoming jobs and work with the customer to clarify and validate job requirements for the fabrication shop.
Responsible for raw material planning, creating manufacturing travelers, identifying needed tooling and fixtures, and resource planning.
Coordinate with other shop locations and set the overall shop priorities and schedules.
Interact daily with support technicians, engineers, and technical leads to meet the prototype development and test manufacturing needs.

education_certification.credential: Degree in Science, Technology, Engineering or Mathematics (STEM) and a minimum of 5 years of relevant experience. U.S. citizenship is required.
